Title: War Machine
Actors: Brad Pitt, Daniel Betts, John Magaro, Emory Cohen
Plot: A general from the US is sent to Afghanistan to 'clean' the situation up after eight years of war in the country. He finds himself amongst tired soldiers and disillusioned politicians eager to leave. In this situation he feels his mission is to 'win' the war, something deemed impossible by everyone around him.
Production: Plan B Entertainment, Netflix, Ratpac Entertainment
